​Savard has 27 years in the military , starting in the reserves in 1987 and transferring to the regular forces as a combat engineer three years later .
He served on five missions : three in Yugoslavia , one in Haiti in 1996 ; and then Afghanistan in 2009 with the second battalion of the Van Doos .
6 , 2009 , when an IED exploded , killing two of his comrades .

His new business , he says , is doing well .
He has four hybrid vehicles for a personalized delivery operation that focuses on parcels of less than 30 kilograms .
